mapper.select: select user_id, login_id, password, name, nick_name, tel, email, profile_img, letter_agr, grade, join_date, update_date, del_date from 13_t_user where login_id = #{loginId} and del_date NOT NULL
select user_id, login_id, password, name, nick_name, tel, email, profile_img, letter_agr, grade, join_date, update_date, del_date from 13_t_user where user_id = #{userId} and del_date NOT NULL
mapper.insert: insert into 13_t_user (login_id, password, name, nick_name, tel, email, profile_img, letter_agr, grade, join_date) values (#{loginId}, #{password}, #{name}, #{nickName}, #{tel}, #{email}, #{profileImg}, #{letterAgr}, #{grade}, now())
mapper.update: update 13_t_user set name = #{name}, nick_name = #{nickName}, tel = #{tel}, email = #{email}, profile_img = #{profileImg}, letter_agr = #{letterAgr}, grade = #{grade}, update_date = now() where user_id = #{userId}
update 13_t_user set del_date = now() where user_id = #{userId}
